cast.overview: A private eye investigates the apparent suicide of a fading porn star in 1970s Los Angeles and uncovers a conspiracy.
cast.title: The Nice Guys

crew.overview: Following the events of Age of Ultron, the collective governments of the world pass an act designed to regulate all superhuman activity. This polarizes opinion amongst the Avengers, causing two factions to side with Iron Man or Captain America, which causes an epic battle between former allies.
crew.title: Captain America: Civil War

details.biography: Actor, author, artist, and activist, Nate Scott was born in 1979 in Little Rock, Arkansas. He was the middle child of 3 children of a Pentecostal minister step-father and a government secretary mother. After graduating high school, Nate enrolled at College of the Siskiyous intent on a career in communications. However, he received a full scholarship to play football for the University of Wyoming, in which he left early to play in Graz, Austria. Upon completing only one season, he moved back to the states to pursue his life- long dream as an actor. He went to work on his craft enrolling in a two year, world class training program at the Meisner Technique Studio.
details.name: Nathaniel 'Nate' Scott
